thread.title: Education says free Guernsey pre-school places could start next year
thread.title_full: Education says free Guernsey pre-school places could start next year | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Education says free Guernsey pre-school places could start next year
text:
Guernsey's Education Minister says the department is in a position to bring in free pre-school places from September 2016.
The States agreed in principle in 2014 to give children aged three-four free pre-school education from next year, provided funding was agreed.
There is currently a disagreement between Treasury and Resources and the Education Department about where the money should come from.
But Deputy Robert Sillars says that if the States agree to their funding plans, then the work is in place to bring in the free-schooling on time.
